summary:
This is my reworked version of my imperial Armor.
Thanks an credits to Ali Bengali and his Perfect Legionnaire Mod
descriptionHtml:
[u]Description:[/u]

I was inspired by the imperial armor from TESO and decided, to create one for Skiyrm because i love this armor.
So ahfter hours of work i came to a result. 
See for yourself!

Almost all Textures are in 2K HD-Resolution

The Armor is compactible for vanilla male and female bodys and works fine with "Open Imperial Full Helmet" from [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2169450]izea[/url]. 
This is currently only a replacer of the imperial heavy armor, officer helmet & Full helmet for both genders and beast races.

[b][u]Changelog:
[/u][/b][list][*][size=2]2.5 reworked the entire armor and changed some textures[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]1.01b - now added a optional shiny version of the armor[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]1.01-fixed a texture bug[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]1.00 - Added armored Skirt & deleted the Tulius-Texture for the Tulius-Armor[/size][/*]
[/list][list][*][size=2]0.96 - adjusted helmet Texture
[/size][/*]
[/list]
[u][b]Note:[/b][/u] 
Its based on the Mod Perfect Legionnaire 5.0 (http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6085/)
It may appears that the armor needs to load a few seconds or a minute.
So dont get in panic if your game stops if your are equippig it!


[b][u]Plans for the Future:[/u][/b]
[list][*][size=2]Creating a Light Imperial Armor[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]Creating a Officer Armor[/size][/*]
[/list]
Thanks and credits to Ali Bengali for his models and textures.
author: kurtie
